name: YoutubeDL Material
short_description: Modern web UI for youtube-dl/yt-dlp with subscriptions, playlists, and automation.
description: YoutubeDL Material is a full-featured Material Design web UI for youtube-dl (and its fork yt-dlp). It provides a beautiful interface for downloading videos and audio from thousands of websites including YouTube, Vimeo, SoundCloud, and many more. Features include subscription monitoring - add channels/playlists and automatically download new content, user management with different permission levels, multiple output formats (MP4, MKV, MP3), downloading entire channels or playlists, automatic transcoding, API access, and a built-in video player. Perfect for archiving YouTube channels, downloading music collections, or building a personal video library.
usecases: Subscribe to YouTube channels and automatically download new videos.
Download entire playlists or channels in bulk.
Extract audio as MP3 from videos.
Build a personal video archive of your favorite content.
notes: Uses yt-dlp for downloading - supports 1700+ sites
Subscription checking runs on a schedule
